query.name: pie
query.sql: SELECT 10 total_num , '及格' grade UNION SELECT 20 total_num , '良好' grade UNION SELECT 12 total_num , '优秀' grade UNION SELECT 18 total_num , '不及格' grade UNION SELECT 3 total_num , '缺考' grade

query.name: bar
query.sql: SELECT 14 total_num_10 , 10 total_num_11 ,15 total_num_12 , '及格' grade UNION SELECT 24 total_num_10 ,20 total_num_11 , 22 total_num_12 , '良好' grade UNION SELECT 20 total_num_10 ,12 total_num_11 , 10 total_num_12 , '优秀' grade UNION SELECT 4 total_num_10 ,18 total_num_11 , 15 total_num_12 , '不及格' grade UNION SELECT 1 total_num_10 ,3 total_num_11 , 1 total_num_12 ,'缺考' grade
